channel.title: Someone please help -.-
channel.description: Ok so if i make someone a hidden mod, admin, owner their chat is hidden also there chat will show above there heads but it does not show up in the chat box... and for private messages if you get a message from a hidden staff member all you actually get is From and no message or name i am sure its gotta be a simple fix please help me!

item.title: Someone please help -.-
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

it would be in model.players.packets.Chat if i recall correctly.

do you even know what you’re looking for, pertaining to how it writes the chat messages?

though, i do believe it’s the client itself.

try using another client with the source?
